content.new:
Deadline: August 15.

Required:

* Docker improvements:

    ☐ Configure automatic builds. Issue #69



    ☑ Non-Nvidia image seg faults on Nvidia system. Issue ~~#45~~


* Issues:

    ☐ Waves not affected by fog. Issue #143



    ☑ VRX simulation is not deterministic. Issue ~~#92~~



    ☑ World generation missing some scoring plugins. Issue ~~#145~~, issue ~~#146~~



    ☐ Missing camera optical link. Issue #140



    ☑ Perception task can only spawn one object at a time. Issue ~~#127~~


* Competition infrastructure:

    ☑ Automatic evaluation. Issue ~~#106~~



    ☑ Prevent unwanted ROS/Ignition topics during competition. Pull request #149.



    ☐ Release 1.2.X ROS packages



    ☐ Release 1.2.X Docker images


* Refinements:

    ☑ Add floating docks. Issue ~~#115~~



    ☑ Re-organize topics. Issue ~~#107~~



    ☐ Spring cleaning



    ☐ Ocean reflections. Issue #122



    ☐ WAM-V force visualization. Issue #109



    ☐ rosbag \+ Gazebo playback in sync.



    Glory:



    ☑ 1.2 video


* Discussion:

    ☑ How do teams submit solutions \(sensor config, propulsion config and Docker URI\)


* Documentation and tutorials:

    ☑ Review tutorials for 1.2.X release



    ☐ New tutorial describing how to run a competition locally


* Competition Documents for Release to Teams - See shared google drive folder  
  ☑ Update competition and task descriptions

    ☑ Update technical guide
